thread.title: ‘The Beatles treatment’: Hundreds cheer Barack Obama in NYC – twitchy.com
thread.title_full: ‘The Beatles treatment’: Hundreds cheer Barack Obama in NYC – twitchy.com

author: Posted At Pm On February
title: ‘The Beatles treatment’: Hundreds cheer Barack Obama in NYC – twitchy.com
text:
— Martina Stewart (@MMStewartNews) February 25, 2017 
Former President Obama surfaced earlier today in NYC, much to the delight of hundreds of onlookers who happened to catch a glimpse of him as he exited a building on 5th Ave. Check it out: Obama just left a meeting off 5th Ave. Hundred outside cheering. pic.twitter.com/6oPC3yCEEX 
— Alex Heath (@alexeheath) February 24, 2017 
Some people even climbed up on the scaffolding to get a better view: President Obama leaving 160 5th ave just now pic.twitter.com/kowtqnif9W 
— Allan Smith (@akarl_smith) February 24, 2017 Here's a still of Obama waving today in Manhatten. People had climbed up on construction scaffolding across the street to see him. pic.twitter.com/cVNF1woz0C 
— Alex Heath (@alexeheath) February 24, 2017 Trending Piers Morgan on U.S. media: 'They've lost their balls'; NYT reporters gets lesson in 1st Amendment 
And now he’s at a Broadway show: Barack Obama just arrived in row just behind me for Broadway show. Performance is revival of Arthur Miller's "The Price." 
— Sopan Deb (@SopanDeb) February 25, 2017 
Here he is earlier in the day getting coffee: A post shared by Obama Family Fan Page (@obamafamily44) on Feb 24, 2017 at 4:40pm PST 
And looking quite relaxed at Gramercy Tavern: A post shared by Justin Timsit (@justintimsit) on Feb 24, 2017 at 11:29am PST A post shared by Michael Anthony (@chefmikeanthony) on Feb 24, 2017 at 11:26am PST 
The former president also stopped for dinner at Emilio’s Ballato with his daughter, Malia: A post shared by Anthony Vitolo (@emiliosballatonyc) on Feb 23, 2017 at 7:00pm PST A post shared by Obama Family Fan Page (@obamafamily44) on Feb 24, 2017 at 4:27pm PST
